column4: im having a very hard time setting up a xorg.conf file its pretty straight forward i just need a file for the mouse keyboard all generic ubuntu ones, i have a onboard monitor thats 1280x800 24 depth and another monitor thats an external one thats 1280x720 @ 24 depth aswell both 60hz could someone write it up real quick for me ps its a intel 895gm driver

i did im also on debian not ubuntu but ubuntus always more helpfull anyways xorg -configure errors out i have to do it in console /recovery mode as i cant do it while x is running it says conflict with number of monitors and the xorg.conf.new file it makes is all kinds of foobard
sorry, I dont have that hardware so my xorg.conf doesnt have any relevant sections
